result.execSummary:
Mark Edward Larson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Mark Edward Larson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Mark Edward Larson
Current: 543 Simonson Rd, Saint Croix Falls, WI 54024 United States  (Effective: 02-16-2017)

Kenneth Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dan Firkus appeared for Defendant Mark E Larson.  Defendant Mark E Larson in custody.  BJM-clerk 1:17 pm  Def waives extrad to Pine Cty, MN.  CT finds waiver approp.  Def signs.  CT signs.  1:19 pm adj.
